title: Tax on car production, supply curve left

content.prompt: If the government imposes a tax on the production of cars, which of the following will occur in the market for cars?

choices.label: There will be a movement to the right along the supply curve.
There will be a movement to the right along the demand curve.
The supply curve will shift to the right.
The supply curve will shift to the left.
The demand curve will shift to the right.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
